website_summaries.verdict: A stylish option that you'll want to wear in and out of the water.
pros: Available in a wide range of colors and patterns
Includes adjustable bra padding and removable shoulder straps
Top can be worn on or off the shoulders
cons: Difficult to keep top off the shoulders when wet

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! I ordered this in a 2XL to accomodate my hips. I'm 5'3 and 215 lbs. My hips are probably about 47-48 inches. This suit was so comfortable and flattering. I plan to order the suit in additional patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne K.

customer_reviews.title: I love it: ) makes me feel like I want ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it :) makes me feel like I want to salsa dance haha I ordered a Medium and I'm 5ft 3 and weigh about 140. Hope this helps with your decision on what size to get :)
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Classy and sexy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this classy and sexy swim suit for a cruise I’m taking with my children in November. I’m 5’9”, 167lbs and I typically wear a size 10/12. I bought the XL and It fits my full figure PERFECTLY! Looks and feels like a boutique suit. Stitching and fabric are great! Seriously can’t get over the quality. Might buy more colors for next season! (This is a real review no compensation!)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit for the Curvy
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit and I usually loathe bathing suits. Great fit and flattering. I am 5’7” 185 lbs and wear a 40 DDD bra. I’ve had 4 kids and this suit does a nice job of pulling in the belly. I am so happy I bought this and will most likely buy a few other colors. Came quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This 2 piece is very cute! I am 5'6 195 pounds and I ordered a size large! I'm happy with the color and quality of the suit. I wished it was a little bigger but I'm currently losing weight so I think it will fit great within the next month.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Love love! Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I would say the sizing is accurate. I am 5'4 and 150lbs. I wear between a size 8-10 in clothes and the medium fits perfect. I absolutely love the top,quick shipping good quality my favorite swim suit I've found. I can also pair the top with a pair of high waisted black bottoms and love it just as much. Great suit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I could have gone for an xl but did large since I am hoping to trim up for a cruise in June! This is the best suit I have purchased in a long time! I am 5’7 195 12/14 most days with 36DD. My husband told me to order more! After having my baby and caught up in work and married life I have a difficult time feeling good about my body. I am not the skinniest but this suit helped me not feel like I am old and tired! Thanks Tempt me! I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christilles

customer_reviews.title: Size Large for 38 Ds with Curvy Hips and Bottoms-Fits Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would purchase a two-piece at my current size (5'3, 180lbs), let alone over the internet without seeing it in person but for the cost, the material, design, and cut, it was worth it! This is the first two piece I have worn in years and am happy with the purchase. The color looks amazing against my skin, and the top will pair nicely with a skirt or shorts. I'm thinking though that I will need to leave the straps on prior to entering the ocean or pool because with so much material, it could get much heavier and I'm not trying to star in a peep show.
customer_reviews.author: Ethnictresses

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5ft 4 in weigh about 220 pounds I got a XL I give it a 4 because I felt like the bottoms were a little tight
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cowher

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well! I’m very and satisfied by my purchase. I have thick thighs, a big booty and small titties. So, it made my bottom look slim and top look flattering with a little padding to help (the padding can also can be removed). Medium is a good way to go if your size 8-10.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Love the style of this
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this suit twice now, as I needed 2 separate sizes in top and bottom. Joanna was very nice and accommodating to all my questions and answered in a timely response. Love the first one I ordered. I'm 5'2" about 110 lbs. I ordered medium at first which fits perfectly on the bottom but the top was too big. Just ordered a small for the top! Shipping for the first suit was right on time and packaged nicely. Definitely would order again and recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: The cutest suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit, it fit perfect and was so excited to wear it. I got so many compliments when I wore it in Jamaica.
customer_reviews.author: cait

customer_reviews.title: But the bottom peice is really great and it comes with an adjustable strap
customer_reviews.text: The top piece is really short the model must be petite. But the bottom peice is really great and it comes with an adjustable strap. The bottom piece is actually more of a blueish color it's not green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best swimsuit for nursing moms!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is the bomb for nursing moms! Not only does it fit like a glove, it basically has a built in nursing cover. So perfect, and discreet for those summer pool days! Based on the size chart, I ordered a medium, and the fit was perfect. I will say it almost looks like a one piece on me, but I’m only 5’3”, so I have this problem with most high waisted swimsuits. Long story short, if you’re a nursing mom, and don’t want people gawking at you while you feed your child, but this!
customer_reviews.author: Chubby Mako

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous swimsuit! A little cheeky on the bottoms! I love that the top can be worn alone with other stuff. If your big busted, you will need to size up. Im 5'3" 130lbs and 34DD I purchased a Medium but should have gotten a large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fav swimsuit ever. I'm 10 months postpartum and bought it to help with coverage. The first time I wore it I was stopped by 5 people to ask where I got it. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love💗
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" 105 lbs and got Small. I love it !! I love the bottoms and the strap is adjustable. I probably wont be able to wear the top off the shoulders as my boobs arent big enough (34B) but that's okay😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, Accurate sizing, Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit. I am 5'2" and currently at the heaviest I've been at 146 lbs. I wear a Med. Top and med-large bottom. I have a very short torso and thought this top would fall a little lower on my tummy per the model picture, but it may be that my bottoms are tighter than hers and a little snug;)! I ordered the Medium and am overall very satisfied. If I could mix and match top & bottom sizes I would be super thrilled, but overall LOVE this and will probably buy other patterns.
customer_reviews.author: KHART33

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a Medium. Bottoms run small on the booty ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Medium. Bottoms run small on the booty. Top fits as expected. I am a 34B and size 6. I would have preferred a small top and large bottoms. Please note, the bottom is not a cut out but a "string". I is similar to a standard bathing suit top where you hook the string so you can adjust it to your waist.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not consistent but great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my birthday trip to Jamaica next month. I originally bought a different color before which I loved so much that I ordered this one the next day. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars and not 5 is because although I ordered both sets in a medium, this one was smaller and tighter therefore, their sizing is slightly off. Btw, I have an hour glass figure, 5'7, 185lbs, small top, wide bottom. Usually wears medium tops and 12-14 jeans. (Hope that helps). The material is silky and seems sturdy with good stitching. Even though one set is slightly smaller than the other, I absolutely LOVE them! Excellent value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade of blue
customer_reviews.text: This is such an adorable swim suit! It’s made of a much thicker fabric than I had anticipated..very well made. I love the high waisted cut sitting just below the belly button. Great coverage for a bikini style. Perfect for the beach this summer. The straps are removable if you prefer that look, or your trying to avoid tan lines. The bottoms are also adjustable on the top strap. I am 5’7 and 115 lbs and the XSmall fits me really well. I’d say I expected it to be a slightly snug-fit since I purchased the smallest size, but it fits more like a Small. Overall, this was a great purchase and I can’t wait to wear it this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this bathing suit. I got a single mastectomy and it was hard to find a top that would fit “right.” I got a small, im 5’4 about 130lbs. Size 4-5. I feel it would hold up in water although I haven’t tested it yet.
customer_reviews.author: ka ying chan

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made suit
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made suit. It looks just like the picture and fits as expected. It is very flattering especially if you have a little tummy like I do after having children. I like it so much that I think I’m going to order another one in a different color. I am 5’3” around 135 pounds and I ordered a medium. The small definitely would’ve been a little snug and I believe that the large would’ve been too big especially when going in and out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: CUTE suit, great quality !
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this suit - it's crazy affordable and the quality is great! Strap on the bottoms are adjustable and so are the straps on the top (those are also removable!), so you can make it fit your body. || Follow me on Instagram: @shadylaneblog - I share tons of Amazon reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Megan // @shadylaneblog on IG

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 100%
customer_reviews.text: Loved loved loved this bathing suit! I was very skeptical about ordering a bathing suit online but the reviews and pictures helped me decide and I seriously loved it. It gave me body confidence and I felt fabulous and Chic. I love the options I have to wear such as strapless, or with strap and off shoulder and as a top with shoulder sleeves. I got an M - 5,5 140 lbs - small chest, thick around the bottom - top was slightly loose but the straps definitely help, I could go strapless if staying low activity in bathing suit, for swimming or actually being active I’d put top over shoulders or use straps
customer_reviews.author: Lolita Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. I live in Florida. Bathing suits are pretty much a staple in the wardrobe. But, as I am knocking on the 30's door with two children, I was having a hard time finding an appropriate suit. This is the perfect middle ground. The suit fits well. I have a short torso and a stomach that tells the tale of my two pregnancies. The bottoms of the bathing suit does well to hide all of the things us women like to conceal. The bottoms stay in place well and so does the top. My only complaint (if it is one) is that it's hard to find a cover up because the suit is off the shoulders. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: A. Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Beach Time!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this suit fit a lot better than I thought it would. I’m usually a 36G in bras and the XL just barely fit, though the straps help a little. I actually bought a lacey bralette to wear underneath because the straps that came with it are super thin. I’m usually a M/L in bottoms because I don’t have a butt, surprisingly the XL bottoms fit like a dream! Over all very happy with my purchase. I will say that if you are looking for different sizes on top/bottom, if you go to the Tempt Me store in Amazon, you can purchase tops and bottoms separately.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Mather

customer_reviews.title: ATTENTION FULLER  WOMEN
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and about 207lbs so I decided to do the XL. The bottoms fit really well which I expected ; however, the top wasn't good at all. I have a full chest (38 DD) so the bandeau portion on the inside did not cover fully, nor was it secure because of the design (something I should've considered). I had to buy a white sports bra to wear underneath. The photo is only of the top since the bottoms held up to the expectation. To the more chesty women, be careful with this.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Gyamfi

customer_reviews.title: The top doesn't look as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I received and tried this suit on today. I'm 5'7", 220 pounds and wear a size 14/16. I got the XL and it is a bit snug. The top looks much different in person. It's not as long as advertised, and the arms dont sag as much as I thought they might. The material is very nice though, I like that the bottoms are lined in black so you don't have a see-through issue when wet. I will definitely still be wearing it, just need to lose a little pudge :D
customer_reviews.author: SMelius22

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit because I wanted to have a 2 piece but wanted to cover my mom tummy/c-section scars. This is most flattering for any body type. BUY THIS SUIT!! You can always return it if you don’t like it but it’s totally worth the $23. It makes me feel comfortable in my own skin again after 6 kids. I’m 5’5” and 135 pounds. Typically wear a size 6 and bought a Large. I bought the large because I didn’t want it to squeeze all my parts and push them out in other places. I’m so happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: B_stein8

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bathing suit to cover my lower stomach imperfections. This one was perfect! I was worried about the sizing since I usually buy separate pieces since I'm heavy on top, however this bathing suit has enough stretch for top heavy. For reference I'm 118lbs, 5'1, 25 inch waist, and 32 DDD (dillards bras). The bottom part with the string is adjustable so that helps for different size waist. If needed it could still be adjusted smaller at 25inches I adjusted the band about half way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering, even on DDD's
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these in size large and they fit as expected. I'm 165lbs, 36DDD, and wear size 8 jeans. I am very happy with this purchase, love how the swimsuits fit me. The only thing I'd have to say against them is that the navy blue top looks longer in the stock photo and as you can see from the pictures, it's shorter than the other two swimsuit tops. It's not a deal breaker for me and I actually like the shorter length but it's a discrepancy that makes me wonder whether all the navy blue tops are that short or was it just mine. Overall, I'm a happy camper and I'd recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Wes

customer_reviews.title: So perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this suit based on a lot of reviews, and all I have to say is I'm sorry to those who had a bad experience! This suit is SO cute!!! I absolutely love it. It is NOT cheaply made and very true to size. I am 5'4" and 145 pounds, an athletic build. I ordered a medium and it was a perfect fit. I'm smaller cheasted, a small 34 C, and I almost could have got a small. But the medium definitely fits. I highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: 2017combo

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is so cute and comfortable! I’m 5’7 145lbs and ordered a medium. Smaller on top with bigger hips and butt. The bottoms were a tiny bit snug but not uncomfortably so. The top is loose but the way it sits on my arms prevents it from falling so no issue with that. It would definitely fit someone with more going on up top. Overall this is one of the best swimsuits I’ve ever purchased and the price is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Top way too big as compared to bottoms!
customer_reviews.text: So I was really hoping to love this suit! Quality is great for price, but fit is so off! The top is super large and is falling down- and there are no straps. Super bummed. The bottoms fit decently- I anticipated that the mediums would be good but had a feeling the top would be too big. Wouldn’t be able to do much swimming or bouncing around with this top! Also, the second ruffle is too long. I would likely cut it out if I kept this suit. It’s likely going to be sent back. Just not flattering enough. These companies need to let you buy separates in different sizes! Most women need that!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of the SAME swimsuit but a different color. As I have circled in my picture, these bottoms are the COMPLETELY wrong size yet they are marked an XXL (same as the floral ones underneath that are the SAME brand) The strings are shorter by a lot. They simply do not fit like the othe bottoms. They are smaller in material as well as the strap. How disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Defective item and not as described
customer_reviews.text: My item was defective. The top had such small arm holes that a child maybe could fit it, and definitely could not be off the shoulder for anyone. The bottoms also were not as described: the strap did not go around the back like it does in the photo, so it just gives an awkward framing of my hips where it had a cutout. I tried to return, but shipping would be about half of what I paid for the item so it isn't worth it. I would definitely beware of this particular color at least, because everyone else photos look great :(
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feeling about this. First off, the white top arrive with make up stains (mascara and bronzer or foundation). I am disappointed to recieve a used/previously returned product with stains. The sizing is okay. I ordered a small and the bottoms fit perfectly (normally wear small or size 4 bottoms) but the top was snug (34dd). It was tight across the arms and bearly cover my bust, but the fabic/ruffles hide the poor fit in the bust. So, I have not decided if I like it enough to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is beautiful! Very flattering! Very feminine! My boyfriend was very impressed and couldn’t take his eyes off of me lol! I’m 5’4” and weigh around 165-170. I ordered an XL, and it fit great! I had to pull the neck of the top up from being a little low sometimes, which I think could be a little bit of an issue for someone who is heavier chested, but you can always wear the top on your shoulders to help with that. I would definitely order this again in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this swimsuit! I normally wear a size 2 or a small in bottoms, and a 34b bra, so I ordered a small despite reading the reviews that told me to order a size up. I am pretty curvy, so I was concerned that the bottoms would be tight, but they're not! Both top and bottom fit perfectly. Side note: The color of the bottoms is a little off. I thought they were going to be more green, but they're blue, which doesn't bother me. Just saying. Overall extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, stays wet though
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, and works great for a beach day out in the sun, or for not actually getting wet. Once the top gets wet it holds onto a lot of water and stays wet for a long time. I wore it to a house party with a hot tub and really regretted it because it stayed super wet once I got out. I suppose that's to be expected with a ruffly fabric top, but something I didn't really consider so felt like it was worth mentioning in a review.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material. Snug.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" and 112lbs. I bought an XS because I am very flat chested and didnt want anything to be loose when the water pulls on it. However, it's a little too snug around my arms, I should have gotten a small. I dont mind though, I'll still rock it, I rather be safe than sorry because the bottoms fit perfectly. Very good quality material. You can wear it over the shoulder or on the shoulder, it looks good either way.
customer_reviews.author: H.s

customer_reviews.title: Don’t follow good reviews, big mistake
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product, as soon as arrived tried it on and seems perfect! The day to wear it finally arrived, a pool party, spend all day in the pool, the problem was after washing it, tossed it to the washing machine, delicate clothes cycle and hanged both pieces in the laundry room, that was Sunday night, on Tuesday I went to pick up the swimsuit and to my surprise the bottom was ok but the white top wasn’t white anymore but a weird kind of yellow, how could that happens??? A dirty Yellow??? My swimsuit is ruined thanks to a super cheap fabric, worst invest ever!!! Never again will buy from this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for curvy girls!
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable little suit that covers up my mum tum well. I ordered an xl because of my big booty and the bottoms rode up a little but that’s normal for me. My top 1/2 is much smaller than the booty (B cup) so I had no problem keeping the girls in, even with a top that’s probably a size or two too big. It’s also a trendy suit and replaced my boring ‘mom suit’ very well! Plus it’s easy to remove your arms for easy and even sun bathing, while still covering the girls.
customer_reviews.author: TiredParents

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller then you are used to
customer_reviews.text: Had to edit my original review. The red one came in and the top fit perfect but I was bummed it didn’t come with straps like the blue one I ordered. And the blue one was a little big so I got a size smaller and the red one bottoms are tight for just being one size difference and they don’t come up as high as my blue ones. When I got the blue one it came in a nice bag with a tempt me card to return etc. when I got the red one it was just a plastic bag no card. Blue one Adorable, TONS of material. Not see threw. Adjusting straps are perfect too
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love. I'm super self conscious of my high hips and "back rolls" but this bathing suit is great! The strap gives me a normal looking waist line and the top covers my back. Top is kinda floppy and a little cumbersome with all the fabric but the straps help. I feel great in this bathing suit and as a mother of 2, that's hard in bathing suits these days. The top can be worn as a normal top with jeans too! I'm 140lb and 5'3.
customer_reviews.author: stacy k

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased another set from Tempt Me and loved it, so I wanted to give this suit a shot. Really cute, can't beat the price, good quality. I love that the top can be worn separately too. I'm 5'4", athletic 135 lbs and I ordered a medium. It is a little snug around the thighs and stomach area, mild spillover. If I could order different sizes for the top and bottom, I'd probably try a large in the bottoms and keep the medium top. Overall it still works and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JennDG

customer_reviews.title: Good Psuedo one-piece for the shorter ladies out there
customer_reviews.text: I am a true medium across the board. 150lbs, 5'6, athletic build, 36C bra ,28 in jeans. I ordered a medium. The top was already not my style, but wanted to try anyway. The top is okay, if you like the off the shoulder thing (def shorter than the picture), you'd probably love this. The bottoms though.... GRANNY PANTIES!! Super weird cut with the seperate strap thing and way more than full coverage. If you want more coverage and you're on the shorter side, you'd probably love this suit but not for me. Going back!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Only for small, lean figures
customer_reviews.text: Disconnected style. Not forgiving. OK fabric. I ordered both white and coral hoping they'd both work out. White fabric was good, not see-through. Coral is VERY bright/neon, which likely looks great with a tan. Style is too awkward and unflattering though, and I'm just barely out of shape. I ordered a large, and I'm 5'7",150 lbs and typically wear size 8-10 jeans. The top fit fine. The bottoms were a tight and didn't provide adequate bum coverage. (If you pull it up to cover your crack more, it rides up the middle of your cheeks.) Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schottmuller

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to blindly buy a swimsuit online. I’m the kind of woman who needs to try it on a few times, obsess over it, and get the opinion of a friend before pulling the trigger. But with this price point and the other glowing reviews, I one-clicked and hoped for the best and knew I could return it if needed. Well. Wouldn’t you know it, the thing fit perfectly! It thoughtfully hides my imperfections and makes me feel saucy and beautiful. The material is quality and I like the fact the straps are removable. I highly recommend giving it a shot if you’re willing to roll the dice! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made swimming suit and cannot wait to wear for our honeymoon on the beach. I even paired the top with some high-waisted palazzo pants and made for a great going out outfit as well! Only downside is my bottom needs a small and my top needs x-small. It still fits well and will definitely work, the sleeves are just a little more lose than I would prefer (which that type of fit may be perfect for others.) Overall though, I love the suit! (Don't mind the mirror, it was our seating chart for the wedding & haven't brought myself to clean it yet, lol)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Payne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and oh-so-flattering!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is adorable and oh-so-flattering! I love how flirty it is, with the ruffle up top and the exposed shoulders. I got the pink and green floral with the black, high-waisted bottom. Wow—they look great together! For reference, I am 5’4”, 130lbs, with a 34D chest, so I took everyone advice and got a large, which is a size up from my usual medium. So glad I did, too! The large is definitely looser than I like for a swimsuit, but the medium would have been too tight. I’m not going to be doing any aggressive swimming or volley-ball playing in it, though, so that doesn’t matter. It will be the perfect suit for lounging around the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things about this bathing suit. I wanted something that was modest but cute because I'm a bigger girl and I just want to be comfortable. This off the shoulder top is essentially a super comfy padded sports bra that is covered with cute ruffles (that hide chubby arms) the bottoms are high waisted and rouched to hide a your not so flattering curves. I'm obsessed! Highly recommend! Great quality material as well (for reference I ordered an XL. I'm 5'2" and 170lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit that fit me as expected but wasn’t very flattering on me personally so I did end up returning it it is a nice thick quality I have to say though easy return with the seller fast shipping if you like this style and I recommend getting it It just wasn’t for me
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty - great value - pretty in pink floral
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and so pretty. Vibrant colors. I chose the pink top with floral bottom. Love the strap on the bottom adds a modern flair. Looks much more expensive than it it. I am 5’8” and chose the medium size. The top will fit large or small bust ( I know because when I got the suit I had breast implants and had them removed - wore this suit both with & without - Breast Implant Illness - look it up ladies ) looks great either way.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Read reviews to confirm your size!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to see so many reviews to help me find the perfect size! I’m a 14 bottom and 36D top and the XL fit me great. The bottoms are perfect (I hate buying too small and ending up feeling squeezed with muffin top) and the top was a bit on the big side, but I would much rather have the bottoms fit and go a little big on top. The high waist is super flattering and the butt has great coverage. The straps on the top are also removable if you want a strapless look.
customer_reviews.author: Frank T Zimmerer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. For someone else
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is adorable but for my body type I hated it. My body type is athletic but curvy I have a very small waist and big hips. The word that comes to mind is atrocity LOL. Sure. I could have won it but I generally go for clothing that makes me feel confident and cute. And boy is this not one of them. I looked ike a salsa dancer and not in a good way. The top had zero support. The band that wraps around your waist could be cute but once again big hips. Another word comes to mind. Trainwreck. Again I'll say it was really cute but just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this, so stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4, weighing approximately 135 lbs. more bottom heavy than top heavy. Bra size 34A, pants vary from size 6-10 depending on the style/fabric. I ordered a medium based on previous reviews and I agree. A medium will be a great fit for those who are bottom heavy than top heavy like myself. I have not tried it out in the water yet to see if it weighs down the top but it feels comfortable on and looks sooo good. It’s just a great bathing suit and the quality is the real deal good quality, not the cheap stuff. I’d highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: C section mama loves!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4 158 pounds (38/32/41) and I ordered an xl. I love this suit. I had a baby 3 years ago by c section and I've really struggled to find a high waisted suit I love this much. I wanted it to come over my belly button and not right around my legs. Perfect fit for what I wanted! There quality seems great, the straps are symmetrical and removable which I didn't know but love. I wil be buying this suit in other colors now... and my mom and sister will be as well!
customer_reviews.author: Hayli Watts

customer_reviews.title: STAY TRUE TO YOUR SIZE, DEFINITELY DOES NOT RUN  SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Received today but probably should have ordered a large, leave for Jamaica in the next couple weeks so going to keep it. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT THOUGH!!! Quality is amazing for the price!! The ruffles beautifully cover my self conscious area’s. Had I stayed true to my size I’m sure I would have jumped up n down. lol I’m size 12-14, 5’3, 194, 38D wasn’t sure so went up a size, next one would definitely get a large and have every intention of getting several. I’ve never felt this comfortable in a 2 piece! VERY VERY FLATTERING!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are weird
customer_reviews.text: The top is super cute, but I could have gone down a size on the top and up a side on the bottoms. I will not be using the bottoms, I bought a separate high waisted bottom from Target. The top is cute and I will wear it a a bathing suit and a cute outting top on my vacation. For a little reference : I am 5'6" 180lbs, and a size 14 pants I had 3 babies I have a mom pouch. The bottoms were definitely not flattering...my husband laughed when I put them on , haha. He said the top was " actually cute"
customer_reviews.author: AGilmartin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but sunscreen stains the white
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: so this is really cute but STAINS super easily. It turned yellow when it came in contact with my sunscreen. So cute, but such a shame that it has yellow staining now :/ I’m really loving the top from this bathing suit. I will say, it’s a lot of material. I hope it doesn’t get too hot when I’m out on the beach. The bottoms are fine. It’s just a little awkward with the random string of fabric in the back
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Measure urself and go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Can I say it....just buy it! Make sure u measure urself first... I'm a 38c-34waist-46hip I'm 5'7 & 198lbs I ordered the 2xl cuz I'm pretty big on the bottom & wanted to make sure the bottom fit. I ordered a few different styles & patterns & even tho they all fit just a lil different I'm so so so happy I baught each 1 they cover just what I need them to & not only look but make me feel sexy. ( & just so u no I've never baught swimsuit online b4 for fear of them not fitting) I LOVE THEM ALL! PS so does my husband :)
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Herr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful suit
customer_reviews.text: 1st this suits colors and style are amazing. The only reason its not 5 star is the bottoms are a little big and could use a little reusing. But overall would buy again. I actually bought for my tall & thin 12 year old who no longer fits into kids suits. She picked it out because she is modest but has personality and the style of this suit was perfect. The seams and lining are solid which I was worried about due to the price, but the suit is made very solid.
customer_reviews.author: mommyroy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a conservative yet trendy 2-piece!
customer_reviews.text: Im a 36DD and bought a large. The top fits great, bottom is a tad big. Very flattering and most importantly it covers up belly stretch marks, but still has a sexy 2-piece look. I kept the straps on because I felt I was going to "pop out" when in the water. I will say the shoulder ruffle can be a bit annoying when in the water because it floats around you.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchika

customer_reviews.title: Tempt Me Women Two Piece Off Shoulder Ruffled Flounce Crop Bikini Top with Print Cut Out Bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for the first time today. I love the look. The top fit better than the bottom which was a bit snug but it worked. I don't know why the designer decided to add a strap around the waist just for kicks. I gave this a 4-star only because they show the picture with attachable straps and I would expect them to come with although as many posted some patterns do and others don't. If there is no strap in the picture, no straps. If there are straps in the picture, you should get straps. I've half a mind to cut the one off around the waist and attach it to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Worst swimsuit I’ve ever paid for
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst swimsuits I’ve ever purchased! The first time my daughter wore it the bottoms lost all of the green color and were just flesh colored fabric - Almost like they were bleached. They became distorted and stretched out. So if you plan to never get wet in this suit you might be fine. My daughter wore it a few more times while we tried to get her another suit and it continued to get worse and fall apart. I would NOT recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: BritneyW

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly for me. Quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have an "hourglass" figure - meaning I have a proportionate bust and hips with a smaller waist. I wear XL in both tops and pants (leaning towards L, depending on the brand) and the XL fits perfectly. It's the right height for the high-waist fit on me. I could see it being too short for those with a longer torso. If you're a different size for top and bottom, I recommend buying separate pieces over a set. I'm super impressed with the quality. It feels more luxurious than any suit I've gotten from Target or Modcloth. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Holy love handles, Batman.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this suit because of all of the awesome reviews and photos. Well I guess none of the reviewers have the love handle situation that I do, because YIKES. The space between the bottom part and the strap on the bottom is like an exclamation point on my love handles. I couldn’t even leave it on long enough to take a picture for the review and i didn’t even try on the top which may be cute.... I ordered a small based on size charts and reviews and the fit was good, the cut was just horrendous on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and flattering swimsuit!! I wear a 36DD and went with the large. The top fits perfectly! I’m usually a medium in everything tops and bottoms, so the bottoms are a little big but still comfortable where I can still wear them. Right now I’m a 6-8 in pants for reference. I’ve been losing weight post baby, so will order another pair for backup separately. You can’t beat the price! Quality is the same as my expensive $100+ suits.
customer_reviews.author: kristi berry

customer_reviews.title: Super flattering swim top
customer_reviews.text: I seriously am in love with this suit! The bottoms cover up all the necessary parts of my tummy I don’t care for and the top is super cute and flattering you can wear it with straps or you can remove the straps and just wear it as an off the shoulder swim top! Seriously so cute! Ordering another color! The top is a little bit big but I am also not gifted in the chest area so that’s probably why.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin stephens

customer_reviews.title: Bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I like this suit! I love the look of it on me but it was a little big. I got an XL because they only had XL and small left. I didn't mind that the bottoms were a little loose but I definitely would have preferred a large. The top is adjustable but even adjusting them to the tightest it was still too big. I weight 180 and got a XL but would have preferred a large.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I did not expect this to be as great as it is! I’ve been searching for a bathing suit that’s sexy and stylish but not too revealing and this one is perfect! The quality is great! The bottoms are standard, but the top is really good quality. The support is there, the off the shoulder straps are perfect (not tight, loose enough to fall of the shoulders while still hugging your shoulders and not flopping off) I’m so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JasminA

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: The top fits very true to size! I ordered 1 size larger thinking that it would run small, but it was a little loose on me. The bottoms on the other hand, no thanks. Lol. They were too small and not flattering at all! I bought a separate pair of bikini bottoms to wear with the top. It looked fabulous. The top alone is worth every penny. I highly recommend this top!!
customer_reviews.author: CathrineES

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for pear shaped bods. Bottoms fit perfectly top was huge.
customer_reviews.text: This mom bod is hopping right out of this bikini. I'm 5'2, pear shaped, probably 140ish, bottom heavy, with a gut, and a small chest (34-36 B) I ordered the large, and the bottoms fit perfectly!! The top, not so much. It's way too big for me. I wish I had the confidence that some of you beautiful ladies have.. but having a baby 6 months ago stripped what little body confidence I had, and threw in in the dirt lol. I will be returning both suits.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Double check bottom size, the top adjusts morw
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. It feels like a mid-upper range quality. I ordered the XS top and bottom and for a reference I'm 5ft 110lbs and am usually a 30C bra and size small short. I felt like the top fit well and wasn't too tight and the bottoms were a touch loose so if you are smaller than me I don't think it would stay up. The bottoms have an adjustable detail band and the top straps remove and you can wear it like a flounce shirt or a halter top. I would reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are confusing
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this suit 5 stars if it wasn’t for the size fit. After reading all of the reviews, I ordered the large and the extra large. The pieces fit opposite of what I thought. I am a size 12 bottom and a 38DD Top. The extra large bottom fit me just right and the large top fit perfectly. I am confused by this as I always buy extra large bathing suit tops and it’s also contrary to other reviews. That being said, it’s a very cute suit. I was reluctant of the high waist bottoms but they work. Nice quality. Nice price.
customer_reviews.author: TRBK

customer_reviews.title: Gives the look of a bikini without showing the stomach
customer_reviews.text: For mamas that want their stomach covered up, but don't want a one piece, this bathing suit works out well. It's stylish, beautiful bright colors, and not your average looking suit. I ordered a medium at first because that's what a suit that I have that is similar to this one was, but I had to return it for a small. It seems to run a tad on the larger side so if you're leaning one way or the other, I would go smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a teen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter chose this. Shes 13 and regular little girl or jr bathing suits dont cover enough for her and she wants to still look cute. I wish she would of picked a better color than black but it's ok. I was a sad mom to find out that the small fit her perfect. Not tight not baggy. Perfect. Shes about a 32 DD or DDD petite frame but heavy thighs & has some booty. The bottoms cover everything and look great on her. Same for the top. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything in for a flattering look
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this suit. For my trip to the Caribbean I wanted a two piece that held everything in. Most high waisted swimsuit bottoms I’ve tried weren’t very flattering for my wife hips. But this suit did wonders! The top hangs down low enough to cover your stomach which I like as well. The top has thin straps that you can keep on for extra support or you can remove them for a complete off the shoulder look. The white isn’t see through, even when it’s wet. Only thing for me was the bottoms seem to run slightly large and the top slightly smaller. I didn’t mind it as it wasn’t too much of a difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey De León

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4” and 150lbs, I ordered the red top with the black and white polka dot bottoms in a medium; and it was perfect. Usually, I completely dread shopping for bathing suits when that time rolls around. I’m not particular fond of the bathing suits that ride up and are the equivalent on of thong, but I also don’t want to wear shorts to the beach either and I don’t like one pieces. Im picky with little to work with. This was awesome, I ordered my size and it covered everything. Definitely will be ordered more of these in different designs!
customer_reviews.author: Sammmmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Cute Suit strange fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute suit but only on some. I’m a fit 5’8”, 34 DDD,165 lbs, usually wear a medium or large depending . Based on some of the reviews I went with the size large. The bottoms were slightly large the top was huge, and hung loose with lots of extra material. The strap around the waist looked odd to me. Overall not a win. I think I will try one of the other styles though. The suit was a really cute pattern , made well, and great material so it gets 3 stars for that. My opinion if you are really large up top this might work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Oak&Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Fit is off but it’s cute
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said to order up so I did and naturally it’s all wrong. The top and bottom are both too big. The top drops and the bottom is almost buggy. It’s wearable and I didn’t want to fuss with returns so I kept it hoping it would shrink a bit in the wash. No luck but it’s mine now. All the ruching for the bottom is non existent because of the fit. I think if a size down, it would have fit great. The suit itself is pretty and exactly as colored.
customer_reviews.author: KC Walker

customer_reviews.title: Provides confidence in wearing a bikini again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size Medium. I love how it looks on me. I’m 5’5” 165lbs 36D. It covers the post baby weight pretty well. Covers the rolls in the back and front as well as jiggly arms. I can’t wait to wear it on the beach next week in Aruba! 🤩 This review may be a bit premature since I haven’t worn it in water as yet but the excitement required to wear it is 5 star! I will edit the review upon my return.
customer_reviews.author: DezMa

customer_reviews.title: The reviews don’t lie!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I really was skeptical ordering this. Good price, cute styles, and great reviews? How?? But it’s true. It’s decent weight material, feels like an average Target swimsuit, but it really fits well and is flattering. Covers up without looking dowdy, the style and pattern is fashionable. I got the black and white top and black bottoms. The sizing is accurate. Really happy I gave it a try!
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Wish they sold top/bottom separately
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews say, the bottom is a bit tight and squeeze the side of my butt fat. nothing uncomfortable, but will definitely give me VPL if I wore pants over it. The high waist was flattering, might be great if you get a size larger than your normal. However, I had to return cuz my boobs are too small to hold it up. I got the teal color with the straps, but the top was still a little loose (while the bottom was too tight)
customer_reviews.author: KndT

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect with this suit and oddly enough I was much more comfortable in it that I ever imagined. The ruffles were fun and flirty however not ideal for an active day in the ocean. I did wear it lounging at the beach as well and no quarrels there. The fit was good, I believe I went up a size because I am busty and usually i don't trust amazon prices and they tend to run on the small side of things.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wish you could mix and match
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this suit. I've seen so many bloggers who bought it and it looks great! However it was not the case for me. I'm 5'4 and about 130lbs and bought the small. The bottoms fit perfectly and were amazing - I would have kept just those if I could! The top though felt of veryyy cheap material and was extremely big (I wear bra size 32C). There was no way I could have worn the top without the "support straps" as I would have folded right over. Disappointing as it has potential.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small and it fits perfectly. I’m 5”0, 110 pounds, and wear a 32D. I have tried on many high waisted bottoms and have not found any to be flattering. I took a chance with this bathing suit and I’m glad I did. I read conflicted reviews about the strap on the bottoms. I personally liked it because the bottoms would have been too big in the waist if I didn’t have the option to tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Sims3

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: Color: WhiteSize: X-Large Top is very cute. Runs small so order up. Bottoms we're even smaller. Cut into my hips too much. Tried sitting them high or lower and same effect. Really wanted to keep the top. Hides alot of imperfections, makes you look slimmer. But returning. Found sane suit for half the price and if I can only use the top then I'm ok with that. I'm 5'6, 175# 34DDD, 30 in waist, 47 hips. If you are large busted, do NOT do the bend over test in this top lol or even move too suddenly.
customer_reviews.author: JeepHairDontCare

customer_reviews.title: My favorite swimsuit! So CUTE! 🏄‍♀️💗
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute swim suit! I tried on close to 20 swim suits at Target and none of them fit... I was surprised this fit perfectly without even trying it on. I do wish the bottoms fit a little wider in the back but still pretty good coverage. Totally fine if you’re young but at 47, mom of 4...being in shape makes it work. Lol! The shoulders fit a little loose but with the straps, it stays up fine. I got a small and I’m 5’2” 110 lbs LOVE THE COLORS of this bubble gum pink and floral baby blue.
customer_reviews.author: Freitagfamilyfun

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was sold as separates, hook on bottoms doesn’t stay
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was sold as separates and I am really struggling with what to do as far as keeping it or returning it. I am 4’11 and about 135 lbs and purchased a medium. I absolutely love the top. It is a perfect fit and sits perfectly without feeling like it’s going to fall off. The bottoms however are not as great. The fit is decent but the string at the top has a hook that came undone the second I got the bottoms on and continued to come undone after multiple attempts at getting the hook to stay. I am torn because I love the top but not so much the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This two piece is very flattering and cute! Good quality material and I love the color! I was a little worried since I am rather “hippy” at 5’9” and 165 pounds but I ordered the large and both top and bottom fit perfect! The strap around the waist is adjustable so it doesn’t cut into my skin. It also hides tummy stretch marks which is a bonus! I would definitely recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Morgan

customer_reviews.title: so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my curvy tween who looks like she is 16. This is modest enough for her age. It covers all of the right areas and is super cute, flattering and fun. It comes with two removable straps and my daughter is able to boogie board and do all kinds of water activities without the top falling down. We have people that approach us regularly to ask where we got this suit from.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah H.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute top-hate the bottoms!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the top of this swim suit but HATE the bottoms. They cut right into my post baby love handles :/ I’m 5 foot and about 129 lbs and 4 months post partum-see photos for how it fits. The material of the top is thick and nice. It has really bumpy/awkward cups but you can’t see them because of the ruffles. The bottoms seem like a decent material. I plan on keeping the suit just for the top and possibly wearing it with a cute maxi skirt! I think this would be a great suit, it’s just not great on me!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest suit. I almost wish I bought one for myself. Teenage years can be awkward for some girls, but my daughter’s smile could not be any bigger when trying this on. It is so flattering, in the appropriate way, and you can tell she feels confident while wearing it, something not always easy at this age. This fits true to size. She is a size 10, and the M(8-10) fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Top
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it was just user error but I found this top to be really complicated. It took me a good couple of minutes before I could figure out exactly how it was supposed to go on. I did like the look of it once it was on correctly, but it wasn’t worth my time to always have to figure out. Other than that, it was comfortable and cute. I liked the little extra strap on the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Top too big
customer_reviews.text: I am returning my order. I am 5'3, 127 lb and a 34C, got a medium as recommended by other reviewers. The bottoms fit fine but the top was too loose around my chest and I consider my chest/shoulders as "broad." Could not wear this top without the straps and to be honest, I was looking forward to wearing the top with cute shorts and didn't really care so much for the bottoms. So since I could not wear the top as pictured I returned. If you just want the top and don't care about the bottoms as much, get a small top. Quality was good though so I am giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: krystal yankowski

customer_reviews.title: not the best bathing suit if you have a full bust
customer_reviews.text: The product was great quality, i don't have any complaints about the material. It just didn't fit right for me. For reference im 5'5 118 and have a 34 DDD chest. I ordered a Large. Its hard to shop for my body because my im physically not a large but my chest is. The top didn't support my chest and dug into my shoulder and i was spilling out underneath since there is no underwire. if i went up in size it would be too big of a band around my body. But again the quality was amazing so if you have a small to average sized bust this is a great bathing suit!
customer_reviews.author: Margarite R

customer_reviews.title: Great appearance...just one problem......
customer_reviews.text: Its a great swimsuit. Well it would have been if i would have received the complete suit. I only received the top and i returned for a refund. Hopefully i receive my full refund. (FYI: i purchased the black one with the palm tree bottom)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Crews

product_meta.title: Tempt Me Women Two Piece Swimsuit High Waisted Off Shoulder Ruffled Bikini Set
feature_bullets: This fashion women bikini swimsuit features with removable padded push-up bra, adjustable shoulder straps, ultra stylish and adorable.
Double ruffled flounce off shoulder crop top accentuates your attractive silhouette without too revealing, makes you look more fantastic, charming and curvy.
Ruched high waisted bottom complements with cute tropical printed pattern performs very well in tummy control. Side hollow out design makes this bathing suit more attractive.
85% polyester and 15% spandex. High quality fabric is very stretchy, comfortable, and durable. Best choice for swimming pool, beach party, summer vacation, hot spring bath and other water activities.

Multiple sizes for you to choose from: XS(US 0-2), S(US 4-6), M(US 8-10), L(US 12-14), XL(US 16), XXL(US 18), US 18W, US 20W. Please choose the most suitable size according to the detailed size measurement guide.
